about.title: Meet Your Photographer
about.description1: With over 10 years of experience in professional photography, I've had the privilege of capturing countless special moments and creating lasting memories for families and couples.
about.description2: My passion lies in understanding your vision and translating it into stunning, timeless photographs that you'll treasure forever.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about capturing your most important moments with style and heart.
about.description1: With over a decade of experience, I specialize in wedding, event, and studio photography. My approach is personal, creative, and always focused on telling your unique story.
about.description2: I believe every photo should evoke emotion and preserve memories for a lifetime. Let's work together to create something beautiful!
